title: Business Flow Model
description: Defines business flows that relate to technical architectures, allowing mapping of flows to technical components and attaching control requirements.

name.description: Descriptive name for the business flow

description.description: Detailed description of the flow's purpose

flow-requirement-url.description: The requirement schema that specifies how this flow should be defined

flow-requirement-instance.description: The URL of the specific requirement instance that implements the generic requirement. This should point to an instance specific to this flow.

relationshipUniqueId.description: Unique identifier for the relationship in the architecture

sequenceNumber.description: Indicates the sequence of the relationship in the flow
